values: 使转动；使旋转；转动；旋动（钥匙、把手、开关等）；使变成；使成为；使改变方向；转向；拐弯；把…用于；利用；使用；致力于；开始从事；启用；转身；扭转（身体部位）；赚得；获得（利润）；达到（一定年龄或时间）；翻转；翻动；把…翻过来；到达；超过；使松开；释放；以…为中心；围绕；转移（思考、处理、观察等的对象）；求助于；求教于；使弯曲；使扭曲；指向；冲着；把…对准；改写；翻译；表演（身体旋转动作）；使逆转；翻动（书、页）；使反胃；使恶心；变酸；变质；驱赶；打发；放走；扭伤；折起；作呕；改变信仰；皈依；盘算；反复思考；（用车床车）削成；削出
转动；旋动；旋转；（车辆的）转弯；转向；弯道；轮到的机会；次序；转变；变化；转折点；趋势；散步；盘绕；惊吓；吓唬；买卖差价；表演节目；演出轮次；机会；时机；举动；行为；特色；特征；天性；禀性；[音]回音；<口>一惊；一吓；<古>计谋；计余；（年代的）交替时期；<主英>（杂耍等演出的）一个节目；短小节目；（板球）弹地转向；（疾病的）一阵发作

synonym.mean: 转动，使旋转；转弯；翻过来；兑换

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指旋转或作圆周运动，侧重急速或力量。
普通用词，中性，含义不确切，可指作一个圆周运动或连续地作圆周运动，也可指仅是沿圆的弧形转动。
指某物在平面上滚动或翻滚。
侧重指物体围绕自己的轴或中心旋转，即自转。
强调指物体围绕本身以外的中心旋转，即公转。
指沿内轴迅速而连续旋转，或沿外部一个点作快速圆周运转。
指作圆周运动。
指外形、颜色、气味、性质等方面的变化，比change更通俗。
指人或物在形状、外观、形式、性质等方面发生的彻底变化，失去原状成为全新的东西。
指任何变化，完全改变，强调与原先的情况有明显的不同。
强调起限定作用的变化或变更。指细小的变化，常含“缓和、降调”的意味。
指进行全部或局部改变以适应新的功能或用途。指信仰或态度时，强调较激烈、大的改变。
暗示不规则或断断续续地变。
常指轻微的改变，强调基本上保持原物、原状的情况下所进行的部分改变。
侧重指变得与原来截然不同，有时含贬义。
常指某人或某物有意无意地获得引起变化的因素，结果使变成另一状态。
常指逐渐地变成新状态，强调渐变的过程。
最普通用词，作为连系动词，指从一个状态向另一个状态的变化。
侧重变化的经过或过程，多用于不良情况。
作为连系动词，通常与形容词连用，指进入某种状态，从而发生变化，多指不好的状态。

word_group.brief_definition: 关；让人倒胃口, 让人扫兴；转上另一条路
求助, 开始, 转向
最后发现, 生产, 制造, 变得
开；突然攻击；作为重要(或感兴趣)的话题
背对着...；对…掉头不管；轻视；否认；抛弃
(经过困难后)翻开新的一页；开始新的生活
时光倒流；回到从前；守旧规

bilingual.source: Close the door and turn the key.
She asked him to turn the page.
Turn the key to start the car.
Turn the spigot to get some water.
Turn the knob to open the door.
Turn the steering wheel to the left.
Turn the doorknob to open the door.

list.abstract: turn，英文单词，作动词、名词，翻译为转动、(损害或有益于别人的)行为、兑换等意思。
《turn》是苏格兰乐队TRAVIS演唱的一首歌曲，收录于1999年发行的专辑《The Man Who》中

yingyinNormal.en: Ring the bell. Turn that wheel. Aye aye, Captain Peppa. Jump up and down.
yingyinNormal.zh: 敲响铃铛，转动轴轮。好的，佩奇船长。在船上跳来跳去。

yingyinNormal.en: Begin to mix. Fingers in like a mixer, like a claw, in there and begin to turn.
yingyinNormal.zh: 开始和面，手指要像搅拌器一样，像爪子一样，这样开始转动。

yingyinNormal.en: Your union has been advised. ACARS data relayed that the left engine continued to turn throughout the flight. Then the ACARS data is wrong.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们的工会已被告知，飞机通信寻址与报告系统的传输数据显示，左翼发动机在整个飞行期间一直在转动。那飞机通信寻址与报告系统的数据错了。

yingyinNormal.en: Turn that off. Oh, God!
yingyinNormal.zh: 关掉它，上帝啊。

yingyinNormal.en: Familiar can turn foreign on a dime.
yingyinNormal.zh: 熟悉和陌生只有一线之隔。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't turn around. Don't do anything.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别转身，什么都别做。

yingyinNormal.en: So, why did you have to turn it down?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你为什么要推掉？

yingyinNormal.en: By playing tic-tac-toe? Yep. Your turn.
yingyinNormal.zh: 靠玩井字游戏吗？对，该你了。

yingyinNormal.en: The law says we've got to turn her over.
yingyinNormal.zh: 法律规定我们必须把她交出去。

yingyinNormal.en: Everyone has to do it when they turn 21.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这就像是他们到了21岁的必做之事。

yingyinNormal.en: I have underestimated you at every turn.
yingyinNormal.zh: 每次我都低估了你。

yingyinNormal.en: After tomorrow, they're gonna turn on us.
yingyinNormal.zh: 明天以后，他们就会对我们开战。

yingyinNormal.en: At the playground, everyone has their turn.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在游乐场大家都要排队玩。

yingyinNormal.en: Turn off our phones so our moms can't call.
yingyinNormal.zh: 关掉手机，避免老妈骚扰。

yingyinNormal.en: It's your turn again. I'm gonna take a piss.
yingyinNormal.zh: 又该你问了。我去撒泡尿。

yingyinNormal.en: So, you know, dreams do come true. Your turn.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以梦想真的能实现的。该你了。

yingyinNormal.en: I believe it was your turn in the game. Okay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我记得现在是轮到你猜了吧。好的。

yingyinNormal.en: This makes it turn right and that way is left.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是向右转，这是向左转。

yingyinNormal.en: It's the ducks. They always turn up at picnics.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是鸭子！到野餐的时候，她们总会出现。

yingyinNormal.en: Look at that. They won't even turn their heads.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你瞧瞧，他们连头都不回。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 旋转; 转动; 翻开
(turn back)翻起; 折转; 扭转
到达; 超过(年龄或时间)

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 突然好转；转机；周转时间；回转场；回车道；装卸时间
v. 打翻；掀翻；推翻；使无效；翻仰过来
v. （使）转动；转变；变成；翻；转弯；（turn的过去式和过去分词）
n. 转弯处；岔道口；车削；车工工艺；车削下脚；削屑

word_family.mean: v. 转动；旋转；转变；变成；开始做；卷入；涉及；车削；求助于；翻转

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 关掉；让人倒胃口；让人扫兴；转上另一条路
最后是；结果发现；关掉；生产；制造
打开；突然攻击；作为重要(或感兴趣)的话题；依靠；取决于
迂回曲折；扭曲翻转；扭曲和反转

examination_example.sentence: As it <highlight>turns</highlight> out, many people are actually perfectly willing to talk—and may even be flattered to receive your attention.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 结果是，实际上许多人非常愿意交谈——甚至可能会因为得到你的关注而受宠若惊。

examination_example.sentence: The move <highlight>turned</highlight> out to be foresighted.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一举动被证明是有远见的。

examination_example.sentence: Of even greater concern is the fact that obesity <highlight>turns</highlight> out to be very difficult to define.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 更令人担忧的是，事实证明肥胖很难定义。

sense_info_list.en: cause to become, change into, or come to be

examination_example.sentence: They bought the seedlings and closed them down, putting an end to businesses that might one day <highlight>turn</highlight> into competitors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们买下这些幼苗（初创公司），然后关闭这些公司，结束了有朝一日可能会变成竞争对手的业务。

examination_example.sentence: You might feel your heart racing or your face <highlight>turning</highlight> red, but do whatever you can to remain neutral.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可能会感到心跳加速或脸变红，但尽你所能保持中立。

examination_example.sentence: Jeremy Wright, the culture secretary, should welcome this positive, hope-filled proposal, and <highlight>turn</highlight> it into action.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 文化部长杰里米·赖特应该欢迎这一积极、充满希望的建议，并将其付诸行动。

examination_example.sentence: McRib is a marketing trick that has <highlight>turned</highlight> the pork sandwich into an object of obsession.
examination_example.sentence_trans: McRib是一个营销技巧，它把猪肉三明治变成了痴迷的对象。

examination_example.sentence: When the skills mismatch is in the broader economy though, the focus usually <highlight>turns</highlight> to government to handle.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，当技能不匹配出现在更广泛的经济领域时，焦点通常会转向政府来处理。

examination_example.sentence: University men with literary ambitions were quick to <highlight>turn</highlight> to these theaters as offering a means of livelihood.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大学里有文学抱负的人们迅速转向这些剧场，视其为一种谋生手段。

examination_example.sentence: To test this idea, he <highlight>turned</highlight> to the university-admissions process.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了验证这个想法，他转向了大学招生程序。

examination_example.sentence: For the low-sympathy kids, how much they shared appeared to <highlight>turn</highlight> on how inclined they were to feel guilty.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于低同情心的孩子来说，他们分享的多少似乎取决于他们有多容易感到内疚。

examination_example.sentence: The 8-0 objection to President Obama <highlight>turns</highlight> on a shocking assertion of federal executive power.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对奥巴马总统的8比0反对取决于令人震惊的联邦行政权力主张。

sense_info_list.en: cause to move in a circle around a fixed point or line
sense_info_list.zh: 旋转; 转动; 翻开

examination_example.sentence: One of these urges has to do with creating a state of peace in the midst of turbulence, a "still point of the <highlight>turning</highlight> world".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些诉求之一与在动荡中创造一种平和的状态，就是“旋转世界中的静止点”。

examination_example.sentence: The hardest task that television asks of anyone is to <highlight>turn</highlight> the power off after he has turned it on.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 电视让我们最难以抉择的是在打开它之后将其关掉。

examination_example.sentence: The growth of higher education manifests itself in at least three quite different ways, and these in <highlight>turn</highlight> have given rise to different sets of problems.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 高等教育的发展至少以三种截然不同的方式表现出来，而这三种方式继而又产生了不同的问题。

sense_info_list.en: one after the other in an agreed order

examination_example.sentence: But it has already sparked significant controversy, which in <highlight>turn</highlight> could lead to trade sanctions against France.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但它已经引发了重大争议，这反过来可能导致对法国的贸易制裁。

examination_example.sentence: Obesity, in <highlight>turn</highlight>, can be divided into moderately obese, severely obese, and very severely obese.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 肥胖依次可分为中度肥胖、重度肥胖和极重度肥胖。

sense_info_list.en: a development or change in circumstances or a course of events; a time when one specified period of time ends and another begins

examination_example.sentence: They develop such a device by the <highlight>turn</highlight> of the millennium.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们在世纪转折时开发了这样一种装置。

examination_example.sentence: It is in the best interest of a school to <highlight>turn</highlight> out graduates.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 培养毕业生对学校最有利。

sense_info_list.zh: (turn back)翻起; 折转; 扭转

examination_example.sentence: You wish that you could <highlight>turn</highlight> back the clock and start over.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你希望时光倒流，重新开始。

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>turned</highlight> from God and the authority of the Roman Catholic Church and instead favored a more humanistic approach to being.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它背离了上帝和罗马天主教会的权威，取而代之的是更人性化的存在方式。

examination_example.sentence: But it can also be antagonistic such as when a political candidate <highlight>turns</highlight> toward their competitor during a debate.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是它也可能是对抗性的，比如当一个政治候选人在辩论中转向他们的竞争对手。

examination_example.sentence: To avoid this uneasiness, we <highlight>turn</highlight> to our phones.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了避免这种不安，我们求助于手机。

sense_info_list.en: a place at which something changes direction;

examination_example.sentence: Whichever it is, you know every twist and <highlight>turn</highlight> like the back of your hand.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不管是那条路，你对每一个拐每一个弯都了如指掌，非常熟悉。

sense_info_list.en: a short walk or ride
a stage act or performance

sense_info_list.zh: 到达; 超过(年龄或时间)

sense_info_list.en: a brief feeling or experience of illness
natural or special skill
a melodic ornament consisting of the principal note with those above and below it
a profit made from the difference between the buying and selling price of stocks or other financial products
a slight illness, a strange feeling, or a nervous shock

word_usage.usage: turn可用作系动词，意为“成为，变成”，后面可以接名词或形容词作表语，也可以用turn sth.+adj.。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 是正式用语，用于指颜色、天气或人的行为的变化。
指人的感情、身体状况，或者自然、社会向好的或坏的方面变化，一般用于正式文体。
指人的感情、身体状况，或者自然、社会向好的或坏的方面变化，get在日常英语中常用得多。
一般指事物颜色的变化，常指物体或人变得不好。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 使改变; 使处于某种状态
(the turn of the century/year)世纪之交

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 关；让人倒胃口；让人扫兴；转上另一条路
最后发现；生产；制造；变得
时光倒流；回到从前；守旧规
世纪之交；辞旧迎新之际
世纪之交；辞旧迎新之际

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 打翻；掀翻；推翻；使无效；翻仰过来

word_family.mean: v. 转动；旋转；转变；变成；开始做；卷入；涉及；车削；求助于；翻转

sense_info_list.en: cause to become, change into, or come to be
sense_info_list.zh: 使改变; 使处于某种状态

examination_example.sentence: For <highlight>turning</highlight> their focus to the needs of farmers in poorer countries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 将重点转向较贫穷国家农民的需求。

examination_example.sentence: Under Christopher Bailey as creative director they <highlight>turned</highlight> the brand around and this past year revenue hit £2.73 billion.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在创意总监克里斯托弗·贝利(Christopher Bailey)的带领下，他们扭转了品牌，去年的收入达到27.3亿英镑。

examination_example.sentence: It can <highlight>turn</highlight> something boring into something interesting.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它可以把无聊的事情变成有趣的事情。

sense_info_list.en: move or cause to change the direction in which you are facing or moving

sense_info_list.zh: (the turn of the century/year)世纪之交

examination_example.sentence: According to the institute, the overall number of deaths has been more or less static since the <highlight>turn</highlight> of the century.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 据该研究所称，自本世纪以来，死亡总人数或多或少保持不变。

examination_example.sentence: So when advertisers try to sell me ways to "<highlight>turn</highlight> back the clock", I have to suppress a laugh.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，当广告商试图向我推销“让时光倒流”的方法，我不得不抑制住笑声。

sense_info_list.en: a development or change in circumstances or a course of events; a time when one specified period of time ends and another begins
a place at which something changes direction

word_usage.usage:
turn可用作系动词，意为“成为，变成”，后接名词时，名词用单数，且不用任何冠词。示例：
这个年轻的女子成了音乐家。
The young woman turned musician.
by/take turns短语中，习惯用复数turns，表示“交替”“轮流”。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 使改变; 使处于某种状态

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

v. 打翻；掀翻；推翻；使无效；翻仰过来

word_family.mean: v. 转动；旋转；转变；变成；开始做；卷入；涉及；车削；求助于；翻转

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 开；突然攻击；作为重要(或感兴趣)的话题

sense_info_list.en: cause to become; change into; or come to be
sense_info_list.zh: 使改变; 使处于某种状态

examination_example.sentence: On Jan. 12, 1833, Creme died just before he <highlight>turned</highlight> 50.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 1833年1月12日 Creme 去世，享年50岁。

examination_example.sentence: It's pointless unless there is a repeatable process in place to <highlight>turn</highlight> inspiration into financial performance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除非有一个可重复的过程，可以将灵感转化为财务业绩，否则这是毫无意义的。

examination_example.sentence: What is most difficult to do when we <highlight>turn</highlight> human values into a programmable code?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我们把人类的价值观变成可编程的代码时，最难做的是什么？

sense_info_list.en: move or cause to change the direction in which you are facing or moving

examination_example.sentence: And, despite setbacks, the tide may finally be <highlight>turning</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 而且，尽管遭遇挫折，潮流可能最终会逆转。

examination_example.sentence: What about making a sudden <highlight>turn</highlight> to avoid a dog?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了避开一条狗而突然转弯呢？

examination_example.sentence: As it <highlight>turns</highlight> out, boredom might signal the fact that you have a need that isn't being met.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实证明，无聊可能意味着你的需求没有得到满足。

examination_example.sentence: The Economist's print edition <highlight>turns</highlight> out to sell the best.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实证明，《经济学人》纸质版最畅销。

examination_example.sentence: It may not <highlight>turn</highlight> out to be the best thing to do.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这可能不是最好的选择。

sense_info_list.en: cause to move in a circle around a fixed point or line

examination_example.sentence: Recently, I was at a gathering of colleagues when someone <highlight>turned</highlight> to me and asked, "So, what's new with you?"
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最近，在一次同事聚会上，有人问我：“最近有什么新鲜事吗?”

examination_example.sentence: Students lose many of the friends they <highlight>turned</highlight> to for support when they move from the eighth to the ninth grade.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当学生从八年级升入九年级时，他们失去了许多曾经可以寻求支持的朋友。

examination_example.sentence: Soupios developed their 10 golden rules by <highlight>turning</highlight> to the men behind that philosophy-Aristotle, Socrates, Epictetus and Pythagoras, among others.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 索皮奥斯在借鉴了亚里士多德、苏格拉底、爱比克泰德和毕达哥拉斯等哲学背后这些伟人之后，发展出了他们的10条黄金法则。

sense_info_list.en: a place at which something changes direction;
a development or change in circumstances or a course of events; a time when one specified period of time ends and another begins

examination_example.sentence: In <highlight>turn</highlight>, advanced technology makes people become lazier after replacing human beings to do what they should have done.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 反过来，先进的技术让人们在代替人类做了他们应该做的事情后变得更加懒惰。

examination_example.sentence: Instead, it asks doctors to advise parents before their babies <highlight>turn</highlight> two that play is essential to healthy development.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相反，它要求医生在婴儿两岁前建议父母，玩耍对健康发展至关重要。

examination_example.sentence: When I <highlight>turned</highlight> 12, I worked summers at my father's small brick cleaning business.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我12岁时，我在我父亲的小砖厂做暑期工。

examination_example.sentence: She checked the index and <highlight>turned</highlight> over to a page about early Chinese immigrants in California.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她查看了索引，翻到关于加州早期中国移民的页面。

examination_example.sentence: Inability to keep <highlight>turning</highlight> out novel products.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无法不断推出新产品。

examination_example.sentence: All I have to do is "<highlight>turn</highlight> on the TV".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我要做的就是“打开电视”。

examination_example.sentence: I think when you offer a good <highlight>turn</highlight> to another human being, one can hope that that good deed will come back.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我认为，当你向另一个人做出善举时，你会希望这种善举会再次出现。

word_usage.usage: by/take turns短语中，习惯用复数turns，表示“交替”“轮流”。

turn可用作系动词，意为“成为，变成”，后接名词时，名词用单数，且不用任何冠词。示例：
这个年轻的女子成了音乐家。
The young woman turned musician.

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 关；让人倒胃口；让人扫兴；转上另一条路
最后发现；生产；制造；变得
开；突然攻击；作为重要(或感兴趣)的话题
(经过困难后)翻开新的一页；开始新的生活
背叛；转而反对；变成和...敌对

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 转弯处；岔道口；车削；车工工艺；车削下脚；削屑

word_family.mean: v. 转动；旋转；转变；变成；开始做；卷入；涉及；车削；求助于；翻转

examination_example.sentence: The piece of bread in the pan had <highlight>turned</highlight> black as well.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 锅里的那片面包也变黑了。

examination_example.sentence: The pan was too hot and the bread <highlight>turned</highlight> black within seconds.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 锅太热了，面包几秒钟内就变黑了。

examination_example.sentence: Running the website has almost <highlight>turned</highlight> into a full-time job.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 运营网站几乎变成了一项全职工作。

examination_example.sentence: You have to make sure you don't <highlight>turn</highlight> two pages at once.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你必须确保不要一次翻两页。

examination_example.sentence: His job is to sit beside the pianist and <highlight>turn</highlight> the pages of the score.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的工作是坐在钢琴家旁边翻乐谱。

examination_example.sentence: We'd come down in the morning to find they'd <highlight>turned</highlight> the room upside down, and left it looking like a zoo.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们早上下来，发现他们把房间弄得乱七八糟，看起来像个动物园。

examination_example.sentence: Just quickly <highlight>turn</highlight> around and say, "This cake is extremely delicious and you have to tell me all about it."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只要快速转过身说，“这个蛋糕非常美味，你要告诉我它的一切。”

examination_example.sentence: Lamb and mother reunited, I <highlight>turned</highlight> back to the tractor only to see it move suddenly away from me.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 小羊和妈妈团聚了，我转身回到拖拉机旁，却发现它突然离开了我。

examination_example.sentence: We chatted about everything and then Ben <highlight>turned</highlight> to me.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们聊了聊每件事，然后本转向我。

examination_example.sentence: This time, she <highlight>turned</highlight> down the fire so it cooked nicely.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一次，她把火关小一点，让它煮得很好。

examination_example.sentence: Simply <highlight>turn</highlight> the machine or point it at the target, and your peace and quiet comes back.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只要转动机器或对准目标，你就会恢复平静。

examination_example.sentence: Open the curtains and <highlight>turn</highlight> up the lights.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 打开窗帘，并且开灯。

examination_example.sentence: Next, Jeff <highlight>turned</highlight> on the second stove (炉) burner to heat up the frying pan.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 接下来，Jeff打开第二个炉灶，加热煎锅。

examination_example.sentence: Maybe you say "go," or <highlight>turn</highlight> on a certain song, or whatever.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 也许你会说“走”，或者打开某首歌，或者别的什么。

examination_example.sentence: If you need some help slowing down, <highlight>turn</highlight> on relaxing music.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你需要帮助慢下来，打开放松的音乐。

examination_example.sentence: Some will <highlight>turn</highlight> to their parents or teachers for help.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有些人会向父母或老师求助。

examination_example.sentence: He <highlight>turned</highlight> to the forest department for help but was told that nothing would grow there.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他向林业局求助，但被告知那里什么也种不出来。

examination_example.sentence: At last, I will be on my own, but I still want to have my parents to <highlight>turn</highlight> to whenever I need help.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最后，我将会独立，但每当我需要帮助时，我仍然希望有父母可以求助。

examination_example.sentence: But soon enough, his emotions took a <highlight>turn</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但很快，他的情绪发生了转变。

examination_example.sentence: Once they arrive, the tables are <highlight>turned</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们一到，局面就变了。

examination_example.sentence: Today is speech day, and right now it's Chris Palaez's <highlight>turn</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 今天是演讲日，现在轮到Chris Palaez了。

examination_example.sentence: Yet, when something new <highlight>turns</highlight> up, more often than not, we do not even know its name.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，当新事物出现时，我们往往连它的名字都不知道。

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>turns</highlight> out that just looking at green, growing things can reduce stress, and put people into a better mood (情绪).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实证明，只是看看成长中的绿色植物可以减轻人们的压力，使人们保持良好的心情。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 强调状态变化，接名词作表语时，可在名词前加冠词。
多强调结果或天气变化。
强调变化结果，接名词作表语时，不能在名词前加冠词。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 旋转; 转动; 翻开

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. （使）转动；转变；变成；翻；转弯；（turn的过去式和过去分词）
n. 转弯处；岔道口；车削；车工工艺；车削下脚；削屑

word_family.mean: v. 转动；旋转；转变；变成；开始做；卷入；涉及；车削；求助于；翻转

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 关掉；让人倒胃口；让人扫兴；转上另一条路
最后发现；生产；制造；变得
开；突然攻击；作为重要(或感兴趣)的话题
背对着...；对…掉头不管；轻视；否认；抛弃
转机；拐过街角；拐过弯角

sense_info_list.en: cause to become, change into, or come to be

examination_example.sentence: What will you do to <highlight>turn</highlight> it into a success?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你会怎么做才能让它成功？

examination_example.sentence: We can <highlight>turn</highlight> a rough stone into a diamond.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们可以把原石变成钻石。

examination_example.sentence: It can <highlight>turn</highlight> text into spoken words for the blind.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它可以为盲人将文本转变为口语。

sense_info_list.en: cause to move in a circle around a fixed point or line
sense_info_list.zh: 旋转; 转动; 翻开

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Turn</highlight> back and smile.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 请转身并且微笑。

examination_example.sentence: While on the road, the moment you <highlight>turn</highlight> back with a smile is the most impressive.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当在路上时，你微笑着回头的那一刻是最令人印象深刻的。

examination_example.sentence: Even if you <highlight>turn</highlight> it upside down, it isn't similar to any other number.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使你将其颠倒过来，它也与任何其他数字都不相似。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Turn</highlight> that tap off.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关掉那个水龙头。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Turn</highlight> the tap off while you soap your hands or brush your teeth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 用肥皂洗手或刷牙时关掉水龙头。

examination_example.sentence: The sensors will <highlight>turn</highlight> off the lights after you leave the living room in 2060.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在2060年当你离开客厅后，传感器会关灯。

examination_example.sentence: When it was my <highlight>turn</highlight>, I shook my head.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 轮到我的时候，我摇了摇头。

examination_example.sentence: Bella! I counted to 100. It's my <highlight>turn</highlight>!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 贝拉！ 我数到100了。 轮到我了！

examination_example.sentence: You counted too fast. It's still my <highlight>turn</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你数得太快了。 还是轮到我了。

sense_info_list.en: a place at which something changes direction;

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Turn</highlight> left into Xinhua Road, and the hospital is on your right.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 左转进入新华路，医院就在你的右边。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Turn</highlight> right at the first crossing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在第一个路口右转。

examination_example.sentence: Walk west on the road, then <highlight>turn</highlight> left, and you can find the school.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 沿着马路向西走，然后左转，就可以找到学校。

examination_example.sentence: How do we <highlight>turn</highlight> on the oven?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们如何打开烤箱？

examination_example.sentence: George walked into the room and turned on the light.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 乔治走进房间，打开了灯。

examination_example.sentence: They will <highlight>turn</highlight> on the lights.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们会打开灯。

examination_example.sentence: Who should you <highlight>turn</highlight> to if you want to take part in the singing competition?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你想参加歌唱比赛，你应该找谁？

examination_example.sentence: Don't <highlight>turn</highlight> to wine to make you calm or help you sleep.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不要用酒来让你平静或帮助你入睡。

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>turned</highlight> to my parents for help.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我开始向父母求助。

examination_example.sentence: He said that he would pass the exam and this <highlight>turned</highlight> out to be true.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他说他会通过考试，事实证明这是真的。

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>turned</highlight> out that in the bag was a special comic book bought by Timothy's brother.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 原来，包里是蒂莫西哥哥买的一本特别的漫画书。

examination_example.sentence: The week <highlight>turned</highlight> out to be a good one after all.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实证明，这一周终究是美好的。

examination_example.sentence: Didn't <highlight>turn</highlight> me down.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没有拒绝我。

examination_example.sentence: You are supposed to learn to <highlight>turn</highlight> down others' invitation politely.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你应该学会礼貌地拒绝别人的邀请。

word_usage.usage:
turn可用作系动词，意为“成为，变成”，后接名词时，名词用单数，且不用任何冠词。示例：
这个年轻的女子成了音乐家。
The young woman turned musician.
by/take turns短语中，习惯用复数turns，表示“交替”“轮流”。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 普通用词，可指任何变化，强调与原先的情况有明显的不同。
普通用词，指外形、颜色、气味、性质等方面发生变化，比change更通俗。
